thread.title: At Least 'Back to the Future' Got the Shoes Right

title: At Least 'Back to the Future' Got the Shoes Right
text:
> Entertainment At Least 'Back to the Future' Got the Shoes Right Nike sent Michael J. Fox a pair of self-lacing shoes to prove that "Back to the Future Part II" got that part right. The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
